Children and adults with developmental_disorders have alarmingly higher rates of severe psychopathology than those without developmental disabilities. In this report, young children presenting to a developmental assessment center were evaluated for psychopathology. High rates of distressing psychiatric disorder were found. There was a concentration of the more severe psychiatric conditions of childhood in the more cognitively delayed children.
